short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The LifeValue Calculator is a Chrome extension that helps users determine the true cost of a productBy entering their hourly rate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TheLifeValue Calculator is a Chrome extension that helps users determine the true cost of a product. By entering their hourly rate, the extension calculates how many hours of work are required to pay for a desired item. This valuable tool provides a unique perspective on the financial impact of purchases and helps users make informed spending decisions
